title: Volodymyr Zelenskyy – 2022 Statement on the Situation in Ukraine (18/09/2022) – 207 days
author: admin
summary: The statement made by Volodymyr Zelenskyy, the President of Ukraine, on 18 September 2022.
content:
**Good health to you, fellow Ukrainians!**

Strengthens our ability to fight and win.
